seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 8+ years experience, which matches senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' with core focus on data pipeline creation and database management

sub_specialty.evidence: Snowflake Database mentioned as key requirement, indicating warehouse-focused data engineering

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mentions of mentoring, team leadership, or direct reports; senior IC role without explicit people management requirements

primary_cloud.evidence: Snowflake mentioned but no specific cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP) explicitly stated

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned beyond Snowflake, which is cloud-agnostic

processing_paradigm.evidence: Data pipeline creation mentioned but no specific batch or streaming technologies or patterns described

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Spark, etc.) mentioned in job description

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake explicitly mentioned as database requirement, indicating data warehouse focus

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Cupertino, CA but no work model (remote, hybrid, on-site) or restrictions mentioned

timezone_focus.evidence: Cupertino, CA location suggests Pacific timezone but no specific timezone requirements stated

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation package or requirements mentioned, location appears to be existing requirement rather than relocation

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job description, TCS typically handles this separately if available

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No student visa or OPT/CPT mentions, and 8+ years experience requirement suggests experienced professionals only

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements explicitly stated in job posting

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Tata Consultancy Services typically offers W2 full-time positions, salary range suggests employee rather than contractor role

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or other compensation details mentioned in job description

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement opportunities, or development paths mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or collaborative environment mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, IC path, management path, or specialist tracks mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have skills listed (SQL, Python, Snowflake, communication) with no nice-to-have alternatives, indicating strict requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description with single clear role (Senior Data Engineer) and well-defined technical requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 8+ years experience for senior level and skills (SQL, Python, Snowflake) are appropriate and realistic for the role level
